nodes.text: 1647 was a date in a calendar that saw the establishment of the Commerce Treaty of 1647, an agreement between the Galactic Republic and the Trade Federation to ensure the latter's neutrality during times of war. 1647 was dated prior to the blockade of Pantora in 21 BBY during the Clone Wars.

1647 was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars season 3 episode "Sphere of Influence." What calendar it falls into and what year it might correspond to in the BBY/ABY calendar have not been established.
